item.title: LV-Data.PGSQL v3.9.1.6
item.description:

Description: - Database management and Selects and Insert macros to PostgreSQL/timescaleDB.


Release Notes: [3.9.1]
- updated dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data v3.9.1.6
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.9.1.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 21 Nov 2024 15:06:57 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: - Collection of VIs to write and read files in TDMS, Igor Text (*.itx), and text-based spreadsheet data (*.dat) formats.
- LV graph to Igor Pro and Igor Pro formatters
- Tools are provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3

Release Notes: [3.9.1]
- updated package dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Sweep Control v1.1.0.9
item.description:
Product: Sweep Control v1.1.0.9
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Wed, 20 Nov 2024 14:53:54 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: [SweepControl.lvclass]
- Sweep Control.vi:
- Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
- Continuous B sweep.vi:
- Sweep B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.1.0]
- Issue #89 KH7008 v2 and Transport & Control Experiment dependencies
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Transport v1.8.0.9
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.8.0.9
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 19 Nov 2024 14:22:54 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.8.0]
Issues:
- #59: Lockin_wweep: fix "Return to Start" logic
- #86: Lockin_sweep: fix Temperature units
- #87: Lockin_time: add pause B sweep if T > T_hold
- #88: Lockin_time: update R and G calculation
- #89: update Control Experiment dependency to v1.1
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Transport v1.8.0.8
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.8.0.8
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 19 Nov 2024 13:21:07 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.8.0]
Issues:
- #59: Lockin_wweep: fix "Return to Start" logic
- #86: Lockin_sweep: fix Temperature units
- #87: Lockin_time: add pause B sweep if T > T_hold
- #88: Lockin_time: update R and G calculation
- #89: update Control Experiment dependency to v1.1
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Control Experiment v1.1.0.8
item.description:
Product: Control Experiment v1.1.0.8
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 18 Nov 2024 15:30:54 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

Release Notes: [1.1.0]
- Issue #89: update compatibility with KH7008 v2 drivers and Monitor and Control program
item.dc:creator: Levylab
